audios.au: In standby operation, which means the towing vehicle is uncoupled, ECAS continues to automatically maintain the last reference level. Due to this the trailer can be conveniently loaded and unloaded even without the towing vehicle, as long as the supply pressure is sufficient.
During this the required voltage supply is provided by this battery box which is mounted on the longitudinal beam. During driving the batteries are recharged by ECAS.
